channel.title: Calamity || 718 > 742 || Economy/PVM/PK || 24/7
channel.description:
Calamity is a 718 loading some 742 cache to allow fun gaming with some new fun weapons and features. Calamity is VPS hosted with a very strong ddos protection server to allow player satisfaction and allow a 95-100% up-time. The server is only down when doing weekly/monthly VPS software update to allow better bandwidth/RAM for lag prevention.
[size=large]]PICTURES OF FEATURES[/align][/size]
[align=center]W E B S I T E[/align]
- Fully working 'modern' website [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f15ec6c5d3a8bb96b1cb29fbc825e1c5.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8ea038835faafbf3dcc95dd3bacec14e.png[/img] - Active Forums [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7806cb2531dfa868cf803b63cf226b97.png[/img] - Auto-Vote [img]http://i.gyazo.com/59a454e5261006a22a17c28240837d52.png[/img] - Donate Page with terms of agreement on what the money is spent on [img]http://gyazo.com/8ca8b7f1a632b84470d0a4607f699dac[/img]
New website features will be added, header/footer ads will be available for those who wish to have sponsor ship of something, and many new custom coded fun features will be added "troll forum bots".
[align=center]S E R V E R[/align]
- Custom client (cool features, also helps reduce lag [img]http://i.gyazo.com/887e2d1c48dbac985805ace532b39614.png[/img] - Custom ItemDB (no need to go online - every item in-game (including customs are on this tab) [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0bf4fc4c7d736be3d97ca09bdaccf6dd.png[/img] - Achievement List [img]http://i.gyazo.com/733cf4f43508fed6bda0e6bf83b39698.png[/img] - Unlock Player Titles [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fef7cdbe46f033602babeb801b91a1b0.png[/img] - High definition supported [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fb942498b12b633d8dccaaf444d04816.png[/img] - Party demon (donator boss) [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b15c2f9054db05350d30b56029d4a78e.png[/img] - Merc Mage [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d31a64d3df9e71fa277e87e6b697e912.png[/img] - Zombies [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5080e13828ad26d2b1b67f8e0ccab0b4.png[/img]
[size=large][align=center]End of Pictures[/align][/size]
Features
- Player Shops - Donator Zone - Regular Donor, Super Donor, Extreme Donor, God Donor, Wizard Donor, Helper, Mod, Admin, Co-Owner, Owner Ranks
Minigames:
- Basic skilling - Advanced skilling - Fight Caves - The Kiln - Clan Wars PVP - Barrows - Dominion tower - The Crucible (MORE COMING SOON)
Bosses:
- Godwars bosses - King Black Dragon - Corporal Beast - Grotworm lair (QBD) - Pest Queen - Glacors - Nomad - Avatar - Ice Strykewyms - Blink - Kalphite Queen - Party Demon - Merc Mage
PVP:
- Working Wilderness - Mage Bank - Revenants
Training:
- Rock crabs - Gators & Locusts - Black Demons - Green Dragons - Polypore Dungeons - Jadinko Lair - Desert Strykewyms - Brimhaven - Abyssal Demons
- HUNDREDS OF CUSTOMS - - ALL WORKING SKILLS -

item.title: Calamity || 718 > 742 || Economy/PVM/PK || 24/7
item.dc:creator: @CalamityRSPS CalamityRSPS
item.description:
@CalamityRSPS wrote:

Calamity is a 718 loading some 742 cache to allow fun gaming with some new fun weapons and features. Calamity is VPS hosted with a very strong ddos protection server to allow player satisfaction and allow a 95-100% up-time. The server is only down when doing weekly/monthly VPS software update to allow better bandwidth/RAM for lag prevention.

[size=large]]PICTURES OF FEATURES[/align][/size]

[align=center]W E B S I T E[/align]

  • Fully working ‘modern’ website

  • Active Forums
  • Auto-Vote
  • Donate Page with terms of agreement on what the money is spent on

New website features will be added, header/footer ads will be available for those who wish to have sponsor ship of something, and many new custom coded fun features will be added “troll forum bots”.

[align=center]S E R V E R[/align]

  • Custom client (cool features, also helps reduce lag
  • Custom ItemDB (no need to go online - every item in-game (including customs are on this tab)
  • Achievement List
  • Unlock Player Titles
  • High definition supported
  • Party demon (donator boss)
  • Merc Mage
  • Zombies

[size=large][align=center]End of Pictures[/align][/size]
